member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.SiteletMiddleware`1.UseDiscoveredSitelet(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Inspects the binDirectory folder, looking for an assembly that contains a WebSharper Sitelet, and runs this Sitelet with webRoot as the root folder. Also runs the Remoting service using metadata discovered from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.SiteletMiddleware`1.AsMidFunc(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Inspects the binDirectory folder, looking for an assembly that contains a WebSharper Sitelet, and runs this Sitelet with webRoot as the root folder. Also runs the Remoting service using metadata discovered from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.SiteletMiddleware`1.AsMidFunc(WebSharper.Owin.Options,WebSharper.Sitelets.Sitelet{`0})
member.summary: Runs the provided Sitelet with the provided options.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.SiteletMiddleware`1.#ctor(System.Func{System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Threading.Tasks.Task},WebSharper.Owin.Options,WebSharper.Sitelets.Sitelet{`0})
member.summary: Runs the provided Sitelet with the provided options.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.RemotingMiddleware.UseRemoting(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. WebSharper metadata is loaded from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.RemotingMiddleware.AsMidFunc(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. WebSharper metadata is loaded from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.WithUrlPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the URL prefix under which the sitelet is served.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.WithServerRootDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the root folder for the application.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.WithRunRemoting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the WebSharper Remoting service should be run.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.WithDebug(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables debugging (including using uncompressed JavaScript files).

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.WithDebug
member.summary: Enables debugging (including using uncompressed JavaScript files).

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.Create(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Creates sitelet server options using webRoot as the root folder and loading WebSharper metadata from assemblies in binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.Create(WebSharper.Core.Metadata.Info)
member.summary: Creates sitelet server options with the given WebSharper metadata.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Options.Create
member.summary: Creates empty sitelet server options.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Owin.Options
member.summary: Options to initialize a sitelet server with IAppBuilder.UseCustomSitelet.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseWebSharperRemoting(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String,WebSharper.Core.Metadata.Info)
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. Note that the Remoting service is automatically run by the methods UseDiscoveredSitelet and UseSitelet, as well as UseCustomSitelet if options.RunRemoting is set to true.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseWebSharperRemoting(Owin.IAppBuilder,WebSharper.Core.Metadata.Info)
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. The current working directory is used as application root. Note that the Remoting service is automatically run by the methods UseDiscoveredSitelet and UseSitelet, as well as UseCustomSitelet if options.RunRemoting is set to true.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseWebSharperRemotingFromBin(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. Note that the Remoting service is automatically run by the methods UseDiscoveredSitelet and UseSitelet, as well as UseCustomSitelet if options.RunRemoting is set to true. WebSharper metadata is loaded from binDirectory.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseWebSharperRemoting(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Runs the WebSharper Remoting service, allowing WebSharper-compiled client-side code to invoke [<Rpc>]-annotated server-side functions. Note that the Remoting service is automatically run by the methods UseDiscoveredSitelet and UseSitelet, as well as UseCustomSitelet if options.RunRemoting is set to true. WebSharper metadata is loaded from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseCustomSitelet``1(Owin.IAppBuilder,WebSharper.Owin.Options,WebSharper.Sitelets.Sitelet{``0})
member.summary: Runs the provided Sitelet with the provided options.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseSitelet``1(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String,WebSharper.Sitelets.Sitelet{``0},Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Runs the provided Sitelet with webRoot as the root folder, using WebSharper metadata loaded from assemblies located in binDirectory. Also runs the Remoting service using metadata discovered from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Owin.Extensions.IAppBuilder.UseDiscoveredSitelet(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: Inspects the binDirectory folder, looking for an assembly that contains a WebSharper Sitelet, and runs this Sitelet with webRoot as the root folder. Also runs the Remoting service using metadata discovered from binDirectory. If binDirectory is not specified, webRoot/bin is used.
